title: Which role's player is your most disliked player?
body:
Mine is definitely adc.

Toxic
Bossy
Selfish(looking at you all who saved heal for yourself and letted your support die)
Thinks too high of themselves
Often flames the support and rest the team
Expect everyone to contribute everything for themselves
Always gets overconfident
Don't know their limits
Blames everyone else, "nothing is my fault I am the carry"
"get carried"<-----One of the most toxic line ever
Salty as heck
Picks terribly like picking {{champion:67}} into a {{champion:51}} 
Thinks too high of themselves



The list is too long I will stop for now

What is your most disliked role's player?

replies.body:
I don't loathe roles as much as champions.  

{{champion:92}} , {{champion:105}} , {{champion:157}}  and {{champion:23}} players are often massive toxic,arrogant jerks prone to massive BM when winning and flaming their team or ragequitting when losing.  I never enjoy seeing them in game.

Not all ADCs are that way.

In this video (which everyone has not seen yet) my ADC uses {{summoner:7}}  me to save my arse... THEN, thanks me for saving theirs.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wrK6nnzbY3w

Still on average I say ADC players attitudes have improved over season 5 where they were basically "Hey, BAG OF WARDS, why arnt you warding? I ALMOST DIED! WARD MOAR!!!"

Riven mains. Just saw one the other day, still managed to be toxic while being a rare breed currently. 

Smh

adc, just so much toxicity.  Don't worry though,
I'm an adc main ;)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hr4knvNNgtU
{{champion:67}} should only be allowed in diamond+.
